00042         function getByRoleId($roleId = null)
00043         {
00044                 $result = array();
00045                 $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->table_link_roles_permissions} ";
00046                 if ( ! is_null ( $roleId ) )
00047                 {
00048                         $roleIdList = implode (",", (array) $roleId );
00049                         $sql .= "WHERE `{$this->role->foreignKey}` IN ($roleIdList)";
00050                 }
00051                 $rows = $this->db->getAllRows($sql);
00052                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00053                 {
00054                         $permissionId = $row[$this->foreignKey];
00055                         $roleId = $row[$this->role->foreignKey];
00056                         $result[$permissionId][] = $roleId; 
00057                 }
00058                 return $result;
00059         } 
00060 
00066     function addToRole( $permissionRefs, $roleRefs )
00067     {
00068         $permissionRefs = (array) $permissionRefs;
00069         $roleRefs       = (array) $roleRefs;
00070         
00071         foreach ($permissionRefs as $permissionRef)
00072         {
00073                 $permissionId = $this->getIdFromRef($permissionRef);
00074                 if ( ! $permissionId )
00075                 {
00076                         $this->raiseError("Invalid permission reference: $permissionRef");
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 foreach ( $roleRefs as $roleRef )
00080                 {
00081                         $roleId = qcl_auth_role::getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00082                         if ( !$roleId ) continue;
00083                         $row = array();
00084                         $row[$this->role->foreignKey] = $roleId;
00085                         $row[$this->foreignKey] = $permissionId; 
00086                         $this->db->insert($this->table_link_roles_permissions,$row);
00087                 }
00088         }
00089         return true;
00090     }
00091    
00097     function removeFromRole( $permissionRefs, $roleRefs )
00098     {
00099         $permissionRefs = (array) $permissionRefs;
00100         $roleRefs       = (array) $roleRefs;
00101         
00102         foreach ($permissionRefs as $permissionRef)
00103         {
00104                 $permissionId = $this->getIdFromRef($permissionRef);
00105                 
00106                 if ( ! $permissionId )
00107                 {
00108                         $this->raiseError("Invalid permission reference: $permissionRef");
00109                 }
00110                 
00111                 foreach ( $roleRefs as $roleRef )
00112                 {
00113                         $roleId = qcl_auth_role::getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00114                         if ( !$roleId ) continue;
00115                                 $this->db->execute("
00116                                         DELETE FROM `{$this->table_link_roles_permissions}`
00117                                         WHERE   `{$this->foreignKey}` = $permissionId
00118                                         AND     `{$this->role->foreignKey}` = $roleId
00119                                 ");
00120                 }
00121         }
00122         return "OK";
00123     }   
00124

00135     function method_addToRole($params)
00136     {
00137         $this->user->requirePermission("qcl.auth.manage");
00138         
00139         $permissionRefs         = $params[1];
00140         $roleRefs                       = $params[2];
00141         
00142         $this->addToRole($permissionRefs,$roleRefs); 
00143         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.permission.roleAdded",$permissionRefs);
00144         return $this->getResult();
00145     }
00146    
00153     function method_removeFromRole($params)
00154     {
00155         $this->user->requirePermission("qcl.auth.manage");
00156         
00157         $permissionRefs         = $params[1];
00158         $roleRefs                       = $params[2];
00159 
00160         $this->removeFromRole($permissionRefs,$roleRefs);
00161 
00162         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.permission.roleRemoved",$permissionRefs); 
00163         return $this->getResult();
00164     }
